events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when component's model value changes; Is also used by v-model
events.description_zh: 当组件的 model 值发生变化时发出;也被 v-model 使用

v-model.description: Model of the component defining the size of first panel (or second if using reverse) in the unit specified (for '%' it's the split ratio percent - 0.0 < x < 100.0; for 'px' it's the size in px); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: 以指定单位定义第一个面板（如果使用反向，则为第二个面板）大小的组件模型（对于 '%'，它是分割比率百分比 - 0.0 < x < 100.0;对于 'px'，它是以 px 为单位的大小）;使用此属性（以及 'update：modelValue' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令
v-model.desc: Model of the component defining the size of first panel (or second if using reverse) in the unit specified (for '%' it's the split ratio percent - 0.0 < x < 100.0; for 'px' it's the size in px); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

reverse.description: Apply the model size to the second panel (by default it applies to the first)
reverse.description_zh: 将模型大小应用于第二个面板（默认情况下，它适用于第一个面板）

emit-immediately.description: Emit model while user is panning on the separator
emit-immediately.description_zh: 当用户在分隔符上平移时发出模型

horizontal.description: Allows the splitter to split its two panels horizontally, instead of vertically
horizontal.description_zh: 允许分流器水平分拆其两个面板，而不是垂直分拆

limits.description: An array of two values representing the minimum and maximum split size of the two panels; When 'px' unit is set then you can use Infinity as the second value to make it unbound on the other side; Default value: for '%' unit it is [10, 90], while for 'px' unit it is [50, Infinity]
limits.description_zh: 一个包含两个值的数组，表示两个面板的最小和最大拆分大小;当设置了 'px' 单位时，你可以使用 Infinity 作为第二个值，使其在另一侧解绑;默认值：对于 '%' 单位，它是 [10， 90]，而对于 'px' 单位，它是 [50， Infinity]

before-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the 'before' panel
before-class.description_zh: 归属于 'before' 面板的类定义

after-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the 'after' panel
after-class.description_zh: 归属于 'after' 面板的类定义

separator-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the splitter separator
separator-class.description_zh: 归属于 splitter separator 的类定义

separator-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the splitter separator
separator-style.description_zh: 要归属于分隔器分隔符的样式定义

dark.description: Applies a default lighter color on the separator; To be used when background is darker; Avoid using when you are overriding through separator-class or separator-style props
dark.description_zh: 在分隔符上应用默认的较浅颜色;在背景较暗时使用;避免在通过 separator-class 或 separator-style 属性覆盖时使用
dark.desc: Applies a default lighter color on the separator; To be used when background is darker; Avoid using when you are overriding through separator-class or separator-style props

slots.name: default
slots.description: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component; Suggestion: QTooltip, QMenu
slots.description_zh: 组件的 devland unslotted 内容中的 Default slot;建议：QTooltip、QMenu

slots.name: before
slots.description: Content of the panel on left/top

slots.name: after
slots.description: Content of the panel on right/bottom

slots.name: separator
slots.description: Content to be placed inside the separator; By default it is centered
slots.description_zh: 要放置在分隔符内的内容;默认情况下，它是居中
